attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We look to you to stop the erosion of our once great culture.  We look to you to dismantle the state structures which encourage non-participation in the British culture.  Such as translation services, preferential treatment of minorities, non-enforcement of guidelines/law on the grounds that we don't want to upset minorities.  We want a level playing field - One Rule For All, and respect for the wishes of the majority

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
False or incomplete name or address information
